code: import React,{createContext,useContext,useState}from'react';import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";const AppContext=/*#__PURE__*/createContext();export const useAppContext=()=>{const context=useContext(AppContext);if(!context){throw new Error('useAppContext debe ser usado dentro de un AppProvider');}return context;};export const AppProvider=_ref=>{let{children}=_ref;const[isMenuOpen,setIsMenuOpen]=useState(false);const[selectedImage,setSelectedImage]=useState(null);const[isFormSubmitted,setIsFormSubmitted]=useState(false);const value={isMenuOpen,setIsMenuOpen,selectedImage,setSelectedImage,isFormSubmitted,setIsFormSubmitted};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(AppContext.Provider,{value:value,children:children});};
